text: eghtɨ atriviba zurara Devitɨn ikɨzimɨn otivam, egh me Devitɨn ikɨzimɨn atrivir dabirabim dapiam. Eghtɨ atriviba uan gumazir aruaba ko, hoziabar apiagh, karisbar tuivigh Jerusalemɨn tiar akabar aven mangɨ izegh damuam. Eghtɨ Judaba ko Jerusalemia tiar akar kabar mangɨ izegh damuam. Egh dughiabar zurara gumazamiziba Jerusalemɨn ikiam.
